articles.description: The two-Michelin-star Welsh establishment has just been voted the best restaurant in the UK. So what’s it like eating there? Damian Whitworth is one of the lucky few to have bagged a table
articles.content: Dinner at the best restaurant in Britain takes at least two days. Ynyshir is a long way from almost everywhere, so you need to set aside time for the full pilgrimage. Sitting beneath wild hillsides o… [+489 chars]
